mapper.select: SELECT f.feedback_info_id, f.feedback_value, o.update_dt as feed_back_time FROM `tb_sftask_prod_order_feedback_info` f, tb_sftask_order o WHERE o.id = f.order_id AND o.update_dt <#{dutyEndTime} and o.update_dt > #{dutyStartTime} AND o.order_type_id = 4 and o.state = 4;

SELECT f.feedback_info_id, f.feedback_value, o.update_dt as feed_back_time FROM `tb_sftask_prod_order_feedback_info` f, tb_sftask_order o WHERE o.id = f.order_id AND o.update_dt <#{dutyEndTime} and o.update_dt > #{dutyStartTime} AND o.order_type_id = 4 and o.state = 4 and f.feedback_info_id = #{feedbackInfoId} ORDER BY feed_back_time DESC limit 0,1;

SELECT f.feedback_info_id, f.feedback_value, o.update_dt as feed_back_time FROM `tb_sftask_prod_order_feedback_info` f, tb_sftask_order o WHERE o.id = f.order_id AND o.update_dt < #{dutyStartTime} AND o.order_type_id = 4 and o.state = 4 AND f.feedback_info_id = #{feedbackInfoId} ORDER BY o.update_dt DESC limit 0,1;
